name: Shawmar PITTS, Petitioner, v. Thomas CORBETT, Attorney Gen. for the Commonwealth of Penna.; James T. Wynder, Superintendent at SCI-Dallas, 1000 Follies Road, Dallas, PA 18612, Respondents

parties: Shawmar PITTS, Petitioner, v. Thomas CORBETT, Attorney Gen. for the Commonwealth of Penna.; James T. Wynder, Superintendent at SCI-Dallas, 1000 Follies Road, Dallas, PA 18612, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 26th day of October, 2007, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is granted and the Writ of Habeas Corpus is denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
935 A.2d 1269
Shawmar PITTS, Petitioner, v. Thomas CORBETT, Attorney Gen. for the Commonwealth of Penna.; James T. Wynder, Superintendent at SCI-Dallas, 1000 Follies Road, Dallas, PA 18612, Respondents.
No. 154 EM 2007.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 26, 2007.
